src:
Jokowi Putuskan Tak Keluarkan Perppu KPK
01 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Muhammad Ashari
JAKARTA, (PR).- Presiden Joko Widodo memutuskan tidak mengeluarkan Perppu UU KPK karena tengah bergulirnya proses judicial review UU KPK di Mahkamah Konstitusi. Menurut Jokowi, akan tidak menghargai MK bila Perppu UU KPK dikeluarkan di tengah proses judicial review yang masih bergulir.
Jokowi mengatakan hal tersebut saat berdialog dengan wartawan di Istana Merdeka, Jumat  1 November 2019. “Kita melihat sekarang ini masih ada proses uji materi di MK. Kita harus menghargai proses-proses seperti itu,” tuturnya.
Jokowi mengatakan, jangan sampai terjadi putusan yang tumpang tindih antara dikeluarkannya Perppu UU KPK dengan putusan MK atas UU tersebut. “Saya kira kita harus tahu sopan santun dalam bertata negara,” ujarnya.
Dewan pengawas
Pada kesempatan itu, Jokowi menyebut tengah menyiapkan orang-orang yang nantinya akan duduk di Dewan Pengawas KPK. Dia masih menampung masukan-masukan.
Orang yang akan duduk di Dewan Pengawas KPK akan langsung ditunjuk Jokowi, tidak melalui mekanisme pembentukan panitia seleksi terlebih dahulu. Jokowi mengatakan, dewan pengawas akan dilantik bersamaan dengan pimpinan KPK yang baru pada Desember 2019.
“Untuk pertama kalinya tidak lewat pansel. Tapi, percayalah, yang terpilih nanti adalah beliau-beliau yang memiliki kredibilitas baik,” katanya.***

Baca Juga
text:
Jokowi Decides Not to Issue KPK Perppu
Nov 1 2019, 12:30 by Muhammad Ashari
JAKARTA, (PR) .- President Joko Widodo has decided not to issue a Perppu on the KPK Law due to the ongoing judicial review process of the KPK Law in the Constitutional Court. According to Jokowi, there would be no respect for the Constitutional Court if the KPPU Law on KPK was issued in the middle of a judicial review process that was still rolling.
Jokowi said that during a dialogue with reporters at the Merdeka Palace, Friday, November 1, 2019. "We see that there is currently a material testing process at the Constitutional Court. We must respect such processes, "he said.
Jokowi said that there should not be overlapping decisions between the issuance of the KPPU Law on KPK and the MK's ruling on the Act. "I think we should know manners in the state administration," he said.
Supervisory Board
On that occasion, Jokowi mentioned that he was preparing people who would later sit on the KPK Supervisory Board. He still holds input.
The person who will sit on the KPK Supervisory Board will be directly appointed by Jokowi, not through the mechanism of establishing a selection committee first. Jokowi said the supervisory board would be appointed together with the new KPK leadership in December 2019.
"For the first time not through selection. But, believe me, the ones chosen later are the ones who have good credibility, "he said. ***
